TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DetailsViewCommandEventArgs extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發事件內按鈕， ，或按下資料列欄位。The control raises the event when a button within a , , or row field is clicked. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件的事件處理常式。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs. > [!NOTE] > 控制項也其他特製化時引發事件會按一下某些按鈕 (按鈕`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 刪除 」、 「 插入 」、 「 頁面 」 或 「 更新 」)。The control also raises other specialized events when certain buttons are clicked (buttons with the `CommandName` property set to "Delete", "Insert", "Page", or "Update"). 當使用其中一個按鈕時，您應該考慮使用其中一個控制項所提供的特定事件 (例如或)。When using one of these buttons, you should consider using one of the specialized events provided by the control (such as or ). A物件傳遞至事件處理常式。A object is passed to the event handler. 如果引發事件的按鈕命令名稱或命令引數的值，您可以使用物件來判斷這些值。If the button that raised the event has a command name or command argument value, you can use the object to determine these values. 若要判斷命令名稱並按之按鈕的命令引數，請使用和屬性，分別。To determine the command name and command argument of the button clicked, use the and properties, respectively. 您也可以存取引發事件所使用的控制項屬性。You can also access the control that raised the event by using the property. 如需 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值清單，請參閱 建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用物件傳遞至事件處理常式使用者所按的事件，以判斷按鈕的命令名稱。The following code example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event handler for the event to determine the command name of the button clicked by the user. 這個範例會使用單一檔案的程式撰寫模型。This example uses the single-file coding model. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCodeInline/CS/detailsviewcommandeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCodeInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCodeInline/VB/detailsviewcommandeventargsvb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例顯示先前範例的程式碼後置程式碼撰寫模型版本。The following code example shows a code-behind coding model version of the previous example. 要讓範例能夠運作，您必須將下列程式碼複製到相關聯的程式碼後置檔案。For this example to work, you must copy the code below into the associated code-behind file. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCodeBehind2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCodeBehind2/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCodeBehind2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCodeBehind2/VB/DefaultVB.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例顯示先前範例的程式碼後置檔案。The following code example shows the code-behind file for the previous example. [!code-csharp[DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCodeBehind2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCodeBehind2/CS/Default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCodeBehind2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCodeBehind2/VB/DefaultVB.aspx.vb#2)]

Public Sub New (commandSource As Object, originalArgs As CommandEventArgs)

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|Initial valueInitial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||值屬性中包含`originalArgs`參數。The value of the property of the contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| ||值屬性中所含物件`originalArgs`參數。The value of the property of the object contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| ||中包含的物件`commandSource`參數。The object contained in the `commandSource` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > 引發事件時主要由控制項開發人員使用這個建構函式。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CommandSource As Object
public: property System::Object ^ CommandSource { System::Object ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the source of the command.

value.span: 類別的執行個體，表示命令來源。

span.span: An instance of the class that represents the source of the command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來存取表示命令的來源物件的屬性。Use the property to access the properties of the object that represents the source of the command. 在某些情況下，這會是控制本身，並在其他情況下會很已按下的控制項。In some cases, this will be the control itself, and in other cases it will be the control that was clicked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷這兩個控制項引發事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine which of two controls raised the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCommandSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCommandSource/CS/detailsviewcommandeventargscommandsourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCommandSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewCommandEventArgsCommandSource/VB/detailsviewcommandeventargscommandsourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Handled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否已處理事件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control has handled the event.

value.span: 如果已略過或已完成執行資料繫結事件程式碼，則為 ，否則為。

span.span: if data-bound event code was skipped or has finished running; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設定為`true`的事件處理常式，以指定控制項不應該處理事件，因為程式碼中處理它。Set this property to `true` in the event handler to specify that the control should not handle the event because you are handling it in your code.
